emerging: A basic system that is not consistently used by teams exists.
expanding: Data collection systems and processes not yet sufficiently aligned with IMF execution.
optimising: There are established data collection systems and processes which are aligned to the Impact Strategy.
mature: These systems and processes are effectively utilized across teams to provide useful information.

emerging: Limited data is collected from a few stakeholders.
expanding: Monitoring data collected provides some promising information to track progress.
optimising: Multiple types of data which represent diverse stakeholder perspectives are collected.
mature: Routinely collected monitoring data tracks progress and builds evidence.
